Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2015 11:18PM kbta032803 wrote: mel the bone scan is about 30mins but you do have to get a tracer injected before and wait 3 hours to get the actual scan. They ask that you try not to move during it. I got the results the same day. Good luck to you!
